About

Alicia E Weaver – Prestige Estate Services provides professional art appraisal services specializing in Fine art (19th–20th century), Antiques, Decorative arts. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.

Handles estates over 20k sq ft and serves clients nationwide.

Specialties

Fine art (19th–20th century) Antiques Decorative arts

Services

Pricing

Affordable online appraisals; custom quotes for high-value items
